metadata.job_to_be_done: Automate candidate screening and interview scheduling

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
AI Job Screening Assistant Report
This document outlines how AI can help automate candidate screening.
Section 1: Resume Filtering
The assistant can automatically parse resumes and identify key skills.
Section 2: Interview Scheduling
It can coordinate interview slots between recruiters and candidates.
Section 3: Candidate Ranking
Based on job descriptions, candidates are scored and ranked using AI models.

outline.text: This document outlines how AI can help automate candidate screening.
The assistant can automatically parse resumes and identify key skills.
It can coordinate interview slots between recruiters and candidates.
Based on job descriptions, candidates are scored and ranked using AI models.
The system helps ensure fair and unbiased evaluation by anonymizing resumes.
